name: Aditya Sugandhi

projects.title: Network Simulation
projects.description: Directed the smooth integration of varied components across data and network link layers, including Bridges, Routers, and Stations. Cultivated a refined expertise in socket connections, ensuring the effortless transmission of data frames among interconnected devices. This initiative underscores a comprehensive grasp of network architecture, demonstrating adept skills in promoting seamless communication and interoperability among diverse networking elements.

projects.title: Improved Algorithms in finding maximal & maximum clique in uncertain networks
projects.description: Implemented Maximal Clique Algorithm for finding maximal & non-maximal clique in uncertain networks, datasets based on Social networks. such as LinkedIn, Facebook, Ask Ubuntu

aboutpara:
Hey there! Aditya here, a rockstar ‚Äç Software Engineer with 3+ years of building squeaky clean, super scalable code. Ô∏è‚ú®

Currently chilling in sunny Tallahassee, FL ‚òÄÔ∏è, working as a Research Assistant at the Department of Scientific Computing (FSU). We're on a mission to predict monsoon forecasts for the Florida region using some seriously cool tech: Graph CNNs and 3D CNNs. Think analyzing a hundred years worth of data (1923-2023) from the whole world to predict monsoon season like a boss! ‚õàÔ∏è

resume.tagline: üëã I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: Software Engineer with 3+ years of industry experience, specializing in designing & developing scalable software solutions. Proficient in a wide range of programming languages & technologies. Seeking a challenging role to leverage technical expertise.

experiences.position: Research Assistant at Department of Scientific Computing (FSU)
bullets: Conducted in-depth analysis of a century‚Äôs (1923-2023) worth of data for Monsoon Forecast Prediction, encompassing variables such as (Salinity Surface Temperature and Surface-to-Air Temperature.

Reprogrammed the Earth Oceanic Atmospheric Science (EOAS)/pyutils library by implementing a dynamic programming approach reducing complexity from Exponential to Linear time, Expedited data simulation and processing for various machine learning models utilized by peer researchers. Streamlined data processing on the server resulted in a significant 30% reduction in overall training time

Revamped a service-oriented architecture for a 40% surge in online appointments and customer engagement at a leading UK-based Life Insurance Company. Employed Kafka Redis and NoSQL databases for efficient data processing.
Engineered 20 RESTful APIs (HATEOAS) for responsive patient data management and flexible interfaces. Collaborated on front-end enhancements driving a 25% increase in user interaction.
Implemented secure payment gateways (Stripe PayPal) and robust Single Sign-On (SSO) for authentication.
Transformed issue resolution: strategic debugging Splunk for real-time logs and swift CI/CD with Jenkins halving resolution time.
Deployed Spring Boot applications on AWS Elastic Beanstalk optimizing patient data management & ensuring system performance.

Addressed varied client needs in occupational health ensuring compliance and security while crafting a robust solution with custom analytic modules for tailored insights by tapping into Kafka-streams.

Unleashed real-time insights via dynamic dashboards elevating stakeholder empowerment. Transformed insurance dynamics fortifying medical life and pet coverage with robust security. Spearheaded financial excellence with seamless Oracle integration surpassing security standards.
Automated system refreshes through CI/CD pipelines for up-to-date technology & security standards.
"Innovated a PHP-centric design using the Laravel framework to enhance user interface interaction on a client co-work website.

Managed diverse CMS systems (Joomla WordPress Drupal) ensuring flexible procedures & guiding seamless content delivery. Successfully migrated Joomla versions showcasing proficiency problem-solving & policy adherence.
Automated workflows with SharePoint reducing operational overhead by 45% & optimizing procedures for efficient collaboration.
Optimized backend database management with PHP & Joomla ensuring efficient processes enhancing responsiveness & aligning with company policies."
